com.salesforce.androidsdk.util

Class EventsObservable

  • java.lang.Object
      • com.salesforce.androidsdk.util.EventsObservable

  • public class EventsObservable
extends
    This allows other classes (primarily test classes) to register & receive events generated by the sdk.
